item.title: [Writeup][HackTheBox] Lame
item.description: Summary Machine Name : Lame Machine Difficult : Easy Machine Author : ch4p Machine URL : Hack The Box NMAP ENUMERATION ┌──(punktester㉿kali)-[~/…/ctf/htb/easy/lame] └─$ sudo nmap -sV 10.10.10.3 Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-10-13 12:35 HST Nmap scan report for lame.htb (10.10.10.3) Host is up (0.38s latency). Not shown: 996 filtered tcp ports (no-response) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 21/tcp open ftp vsftpd 2.3.4 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 4.7p1 Debian 8ubuntu1 (protocol 2.
